charges.charge_disposition: CBOP imprisonment for 150 months on cts. 1,2,3 &; 4 to be served concurrently. 5 years supervised release on cts. 1,2,3&; 4 to be served concurrently, with standard and special conditions. $400.00 special assessment. Fine waived.

charges.charge_description: 21:841(a)(1) - DISTRIBUTION OF 50 GRAMS OR MORE OF ACTUAL (PURE) METHAMPHETAMINE(1)

charges.charge_disposition: CBOP imprisonment for 150 months on cts. 1,2,3 &; 4 to be served concurrently. 5 years supervised release on cts. 1,2,3&; 4 to be served concurrently, with standard and special conditions. $400.00 special assessment. Fine waived.
